page.title: 13Life in Stepaside Village.
page.content: Kaye Howells lives in Stepaside and she is 9. She has many books and she reads every night. She plays with Hazel and Melanie James games like rounders or on their bicycles. She plays 3 instruments, the recorder, the violin and the piano. She has lessons every Monday on the piano with Mrs. Lewis. She lives near the school and sometimes walks or goes by car. She swims in a beach called Wiseman's Bridge. She writes, "The dinner ladies are Mrs. Morgan and Mrs. Gill. Some children in our school have school dinners but I bring sandwiches to school." Kaye knows Mrs. Dennis a housewife in the village. In the morning she makes the beds, washes up dishes and hoovers the rooms. She likes quiz programmes, travel programmes and situation comedy on T.V. She reads the Western Mail.
